scripts.openapi: npm run openapi:generator && npm run openapi:publish
scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test concurrently  -p "[{time}] [{name}]" -n "WATCH,SERVER,ORTHER" -c "blue.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" --kill-others "npm run build:watch" "npm run start:watch" -e NODE_ENV=test
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently  -p "[{time}] [{name}]" -n "WATCH,SERVER,ORTHER" -c "blue.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" --kill-others "npm run build:watch" "npm run start:watch" -e NODE_ENV=development
scripts.start:docker: cross-env NODE_ENV=docker concurrently -p "[{time}] [{name}]" -n "WATCH,SERVER,ORTHER" -c "blue.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" --kill-others "npm run build:watch" "npm run start:watch"
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently  -p "[{time}] [{name}]" -n "WATCH,SERVER,ORTHER" -c "blue.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold" --kill-others "npm run build:watch" "npm run start:watch" -e NODE_ENV=production
scripts.prisma:dev:push: npm run dotenv:dev prisma db push
scripts.prisma:dev:migrate: npm run dotenv:dev prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:dev:pull: npm run dotenv:dev prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:prod:push: npm run dotenv:prod prisma db push
scripts.prisma:prod:migrate: npm run dotenv:prod prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:prod:pull: npm run dotenv:prod prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:docker:push: npm run dotenv:docker prisma db push
scripts.prisma:docker:migrate: npm run dotenv:docker prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:docker:pull: npm run dotenv:docker prisma db pull
